title: Conservative organizer calls alt-right groups 'left-wing fascists' - The Washington Post
text: Conservative organizer calls alt-right groups 'left-wing fascists' Please enable flash to watch this video. Sorry, this video is not available. Your browser does not currently support live streaming video. Play Video Live Video - Dan Schneider, executive director of the American Conservative Union, told attendees at the 2017 Conservative Political Action Conference on Feb. 23 that members of the alt-right are “anti-Semites, they are racists, they are sexists.” ( ) RELATED LINKS - Dan Schneider, executive director of the American Conservative Union, told attendees at the 2017 Conservative Political Action Conference on Feb. 23 that members of the alt-right are “anti-Semites, they are racists, they are sexists.” ( ) Conservative organizer calls alt-right groups 'left-wing fascists' ( 3:58 ) Playlist Politics
